description: This file is a Gradle build script written in Kotlin DSL for configuring build settings, repositories, dependencies, plugins, and tasks for an Android project.

methods.name: buildscript
methods.description: Configures buildscript repositories and dependencies for the Gradle build.

methods.name: repositories
methods.description: Defines repositories for resolving dependencies, here google() and mavenCentral().

methods.name: dependencies
methods.description: Specifies dependencies for the build script, including Android Gradle plugin and Kotlin plugin.

methods.name: classpath
methods.description: Adds classpath dependencies to the buildscript configuration.

methods.name: plugins
methods.description: Applies plugins to the project, here Android application and Kotlin Android plugins.

methods.name: tasks.register
methods.description: Registers a custom task named 'clean' that deletes the build directory.
